name: TKSmartCardSlotManager
desc: An interface to all available smart card reader slots.

items.name: class var `default`: TKSmartCardSlotManager?
items.desc: The shared singleton Smart Card reader slot manager.

items.name: var slotNames: [String]
items.desc: A list of identifiers for all the Smart Card reader slots available to the system.

items.name: func getSlot(withName: String, reply: (TKSmartCardSlot?) -> Void)
items.desc: Asynchronously calls a block with a Smart Card reader slot for a specified name.

items.name: func slotNamed(String) -> TKSmartCardSlot?
items.desc: Returns the Smart Card slot with a given name.
